H0.text: Which vegetable is added to Lasagne to make 'Lasagne Verdi'. Kale

H1.text: Which vegetable is added to Lasagne to make 'Lasagne Verdi'. Zucchini

H2.text: Which vegetable is added to Lasagne to make 'Lasagne Verdi'. Green Beans

H3.text: Which vegetable is added to Lasagne to make 'Lasagne Verdi'. SPINACH

A4.text: Lasagne alla ferrarese, from Ferrara, features sheets of green pasta (created by mixing spinach into the pasta dough)
